about_project: Internal IT Project Medplanic => Roster Planning Software designed by anesthesiologists in Switzerland for hospitals. The system provides flexible multi-weekly availability patterns with unlimited number of preferences set for every single day in order to manage doctors working time. Implemented algorithm deals with sophisticated legal policies and handles individual plans of residents. The system has an intuitive user interface with drag and drop features. The absent days such as maternity or sick leaves can also be managed and reported. Medplanic automatically deals with the sudden and unexpected changes.

about_project: The Corporate Treasury & Finance Risk team is an important pillar of The Treasury Risk Management (TRM) second line of defence team for balance sheet risk for HBSC Group. The team provides subject matter expert oversight over Treasury activities specific to Capital, Stress Testing, Recovery and Resolution and Financial planning in the form of strategy, policies and analysis to support effective risk management. This includes collaborative and critical thinking with Treasury and Global businesses (the First line of Defence) to ensure early identification and remediation of emerging risks.

about_project: At Affirm, data is fundamental to everything we do. Our data and storage solutions empower machine learning, artificial intelligence, cloud-based technologies, and other modern tools to create differential and scalable products. We prioritize building our own technology and investing in engineering talent, as we believe these are enduring competitive advantages that are difficult to replicate. Our expertise in sourcing, aggregating, protecting, and analyzing data has been what we believe to be a core competitive advantage of our platform since our founding. expected_requirements: ['Masterâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Information Technology, Business Administration, or a related field.', 'Minimum of 10 years of experience in a digital transformation leadership role, with a strong emphasis on Artificial Intelligence, Robotic Process Automation, and data science.', 'Proven experience in SAP process automation and integration, with a deep understanding of SAP systems and data structures.', 'Extensive knowledge of AI frameworks, machine learning algorithms, and their application in automating and improving business processes, especially in finance and accounting.', 'Proficient in translating technical IT concepts into clear, concise language that business stakeholders can understand and act upon.', 'Fluent in English; proficiency in German is highly advantageous.', 'Demonstrated leadership and project management skills, with a proven track record of leading cross-functional teams and driving digital projects to successful completion.', 'Strong analytical and strategic thinking skills, with an ability to use data and metrics to back up assumptions and evaluate outcomes.', 'Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, capable of fostering strong collaboration between the IT department and other business units.']
optional_requirements: ['An advantage would be proficiency in CELONIS, READSOFT, COUPA, M356.']
responsibilities: ['Lead the strategic planning and execution of comprehensive digital transformation initiatives, with a primary focus on leveraging Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Robotic Process Automation (RPA) to streamline and enhance accounting and financial operations.', 'Act as a bridge between technical and non-technical stakeholders, translating complex digital concepts into understandable language and actionable strategies.', 'Integrate advanced data science methodologies to analyze financial data, identify trends, and provide actionable insights hereby supporting data-driven decision-making across the organization.', 'Spearhead the automation and optimization of financial processes using SAP and other automation tools, ensuring efficiency gains.', 'Collaborate with BSC accounting functions and IT to identify opportunities for process improvements and cost reductions through the application of AI, machine learning models, and other digital technologies.', 'Foster an environment of continuous learning and development regarding digital technologies among staff, enhancing the organizationâ€™s digital literacy and capabilities.', 'Ensure that all digital transformation projects adhere to industry standards and compliance requirements, particularly concerning data security and privacy.', 'Regularly assess the digital landscape for new tools, trends, and technologies that could benefit the organization, particularly those related to AI, RPA, and data science.']
what_they_offer: ['Impactful Work: An opportunity to make a real impact on the organization by leading its digital transformation. Your work will directly contribute to reshaping and modernizing our operations, positioning REHAU as a leader in digital innovation within our industry.', 'Central Location: Benefit from working in our central office located in PoznaÅ„, providing a vibrant, dynamic environment conducive to creativity and collaboration.', 'Collaborative Environment: Work within a supportive Business Service Center and interact with various business streams and service functions, offering a unique opportunity to collaborate across the REHAU group and influence the direction of our digital journey.', "Professional Growth: Engage in continuous learning and development opportunities as you lead the charge in implementing cutting-edge digital solutions, enhancing your own professional skill set while contributing to the organization's success.", 'Strategic Influence: Play a critical role in aligning technological solutions with business objectives, ensuring that digital initiatives deliver tangible results and drive value realization across the organization.', 'Cultural Transformation: Be at the heart of a cultural shift within REHAU, fostering a digital-first mindset and encouraging innovative thinking and process adoption across the company.', 'Supportive Leadership: Work under the guidance of supportive BSC management who are committed to steering digital transformation and ensuring that you have the resources and backing to succeed.', "Competitive Compensation and Benefits: Receive a competitive salary and benefits package that reflects the importance and impact of your role in the organization's digital transformation journey."]

about_project: As part of the Data & AI area, we implement projects based on the practical "data science" and "artificial intelligence" applications of an unprecedented scale in Poland. Data & AI is a group of over 150 experienced BigData engineers organized into over a dozen teams with various specializations. Some of them build dedicated tools for creating and launching BigData processes or implementing ML models for the entire organization. Others work closer to the client and are responsible for the implementation of the search engine, creating recommendations, building a buyer profile or developing an experimental platform. There are also research teams in the area whose aim is to find solutions to non-trivial problems requiring the use of machine learning.

expected_requirements: ['6+ years of demonstrated experience in the Technology/IT industry.', '6+ years of demonstrated experience with business application/business analysis on an enterprise wide system.', 'Understanding of enterprise and consumer technology concepts including client/server languages and architectures, ERP systems, CRM, SCM, cloud architectures, web and mobile application development, transactional and non-transactional database concepts, etc.', '3+ yearsâ€™ experience working with packaged applications such as Oracle or Microsoft or Salesforce or similar.', '2+ yearsâ€™ experience with complex, multi-national application implementations.', 'Must have Project Delivery lead experience and ability to lead and mentor junior team members.', 'Experience with Microsoft Office Word, Excel, PowerPoint & Visio.', 'Strong analytical skills and the ability to analyze complex multi-tiered application implementations and data structures.', 'Ability to effectively manage multiple, competing, high-priority projects with varying deadlines.', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills, with a demonstrated ability to communicate effectively with all levels of an organization.', 'Very good understanding of the technical aspects of application development and design in one or more of the following areas - Java, .NET, JavaScript application frameworks, understanding of database concepts and basic expertise in SQL and/or related technologies such as Microsoft SQL Server or Oracle PLSQL, HTML5, XML technologies.', 'Experience working on packaged applications such as Oracle/Salesforce/Microsoft or similar and customizing them to the organizational needs as per business processes.']
